issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Testing Infrastructure
components.description: Tracks issues with tests and testing infrastructure.

fields.description: This test fails sporadically due to a race condition, which is annoying since it hinders pre-commit testing of patches.  I'm going to disable it unless someone has a fix.
